p: Evidence for the lack of competence of other Culex species was recently provided via populations of C. pipiens from Italy, the US, Tunisia, and Germany that were experimentally exposed to ZIKV through an artificial blood meal without being infected [ 33, 35, 39, 42, 49, 73, 74]. Similarly, ZIKV infection could not be detected in Culex sitiens and Culex annulirostris from Australia [ 38, 51] nor for Culex torrentium and Culex molestus from Germany [ 42].
